lines.text:
[to Dr. Zuckerman while telling him an edited version of her life story]
Whatever you do, never let yourself get buried alive.

[as he and Angelique are about to make love in her coffin]
You call this a bed?

[to Dr. Zuckerman, who's just realized he's become a vampire]
Welcome to the beast!

[after Angelique has just rammed a stake into his heart through his back]
Angelique! You've broken my heart!
